title: Bedcover, 1791
description: Three pieces of unbleached linen cloth decorated with weft looping and joined loosely on the long sides. Heavy pattern wefts looped on surface to form stylized animals and flowers in square framework. Left piece has inscriptions above and below large panel with vase and flowers: "Año de 1791. Sole Antonio Garcia." Linen fringe on three sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 1791. Medium: linen
Technique: weft looping. 1950-122-4.
